alert.note: Alert for Ellis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 6:02PM CDT until June 14 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ELLIS COUNTY... At 602 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ennis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Waxahachie, Ennis, Palmer, Bardwell, Alma, Bardwell Lake, Garrett, Bristol, Reagor Springs, Telico, Crisp, Howard and Boyce. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
